messages.subject: strange music request
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! By any chance, would any of you have the Soundtrack to the Samurai Trilogy about Musashi, by Kuma Dan?  I can t find anyplace that can get a copy in
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

By any chance, would any of you have the Soundtrack to the "Samurai
Trilogy" about Musashi, by Kuma Dan? I can't find anyplace that can
get a copy in :(

Would someone be willing to burn me a copy if you have it?

Kindest regards,
-Jason
